DOC.criteria: Inpatient hospitalize < 14 day prior enrollment Requires PN oral enteral nutrition possible , insufficient , contraindicate Has capability complete least 5 day study treatment ( i.e. , PN ) Has useable peripheral vein delivery intravenous ( IV ) PN Has life expectancy < 6 day initiation study treatment , opinion Investigator Known hypersensitivity component either investigational study treatment Use prohibit medication ( e.g . glucocorticosteroids antitumor chemotherapeutic agent ) within 30 day prior enrollment Known serious clinically significant condition would preclude participation study Known chronic active hepatitis , elevate liver function test Known history human immunodeficiency virus infection Known severe dyslipidemia , severe hyperglycemia , clinically significant abnormality plasma electrolyte Known pregnancy lactation
